Sandra TeoLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 23 Feb 2019Many people assume that they will invest after a crash but it is difficult to determine when to invest after the crash happens. It is also hard to invest when you are surrounded by pessimistic news and future outlook. Research has shown that sitting on the sidelines cost more than investing when the market is at its peak. 0 comments0
